quest.name: Forgotten Resolve
journal: The spineless soldier needs someone to fight his fight for him.
objectives: Defeat the skilled samurai and use the pitch-black ink on him.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: How long do you intend to rest? You shan't ever improve at this rate.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: I say, are you not Forename Surname, the famous hero from Eorzea? Oh, thank the kami for sending you to me!

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: You see, I've been searching for someone to train with my comrade in my stead. He is strong, while I am...not. As such, I am unable to offer him meaningful contest.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: If you are as strong as you say, my ladylord, I should be honored for the opportunity to spar with you!

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Of course, we would take care to avoid lasting injuries. Will you consent to training with my comrade?

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: You have our thanks! Pray join us outside whenever you are ready. Head left upon exiting the cave and ascend the hill, and you will find us.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: My comrade will explain the rules to you. Pray have them from him, and we may begin.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: My thanks for coming. First of all, allow me to explain the rules. They are intended to test one's skills while preventing injury.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: 'Tis quite simple, really. The objective is to catch your opponent off guard and draw a mark upon his face using this ink. That is all.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: My comrade awaits yonder. We shall begin at your word.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: My comrade awaits yonder. We begin whenever you are ready, my ladylord.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Here I come, then!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You are under attack!

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: A-Amazing! I had heard the tales, but your skills far surpass them all!

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Never before have I witnessed training so intense, so furious... I-I find I cannot stop trembling. P-Please join us back inside.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Your fighting skills are extraordinary, my ladylord! And your touch with the quill is no less impressive!

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Ordinarily, I tremble out of fear. This time, 'twas out of awe at your skills...and something else to which I could not place a name. But then it came to me.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: 'Twas a memory─the memory of the day I swore to give my life for Doma's liberation!

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Aye, the two of us vowed to grow stronger, and to that end we have been training body and mind both. Beholding your skills this day has served to spur us in this goal.

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Looking back now, it shames me that I was so quick to depend upon you. For if I am not a worthy training partner, should I not strive to become one who is?

dialogue.name: BIGBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: From this moment on, I shall train as I have never trained before! Come, brother─the nightday is still young!

dialogue.name: YOUNGERBROTHERSAMURAI
dialogue.text: To think that the day would come when he takes the lead... You have awakened him to his inner passion, and for this I give you my sincerest thanks.

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
